entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers or drizzle beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
